UsageÂ¶

See Code for an example application.

The essence is this:

  1. Define the applciation model using Pydantic.

  2. Use the syntdata.base.SynthesizeModel for a single BaseModel. Use syntdata.base.SynthesizeSchema for a schema with multiple, related BaseModel.

  3. The syntdata.base.SynthesizeModel is an Iterator over BaseModel objects. The syntdata.base.SynthesizeSchema can emit Iterators over BaseModel objects for each model in the schema.

  4. Serialize the objects.
